Survey

The survey will take about 5 minutes, asking about general teaching information, your spare time and one map question. It will NOT ask for your name or email. Please answer all questions.

1. What is your gender?

2. What is your age range?

3. What college/school are you part of?

4. What was the most recent year you've taught at UCR?

5. How many years have you taught at college level?

6. How many hours do you prepare per hour of lecture time, on average?

7. Generally, exams are graded by? (click all that apply)

8. How many hours do you work a week, on average?

Max digits: 3

9. How are you instructing classes?

10. Are you tenured?

11. What division of courses do you teach? (select all that apply)

12. How much free time do you have per day, on average?

In questions 12-13, free time is spare time where you do something that's fun and not an obligation. Something like working past work hours or cooking because you have to eat does not count as free time

13. What do you do in your spare time? (select all that apply)

Please generalize if something is already listed. Otherwise, add other activities separated by a comma below.

14. Name any country in the world.

(Optional) Feedback
